Topics for the upcoming weeks that are as follows:

1)Scenario Trivia Contest - I'll hit answers to the objective  
questions first  during the first week, then tackle 2-3 objective 
questions at a time.  That's going to take 4 weeks minimum to go  
through those.
  
2)Critique of dph's legimate scenarios.  Don't worry I will not  
"punish" anyone for bad reviews.  This will take a few weeks and I'll 
also be listing what the heck was going through my mind when I   
designed each of my scenarios.
 
3)ideas for high experience levels
 
4)the advantages and disadvantages of single player teams
 
5)Why I believe Gladiator is a really, great game
 
6)Various Ways to make scenarios more . . . interesting

**Scenario Trivia Contest**

I guess I'll redo the format to make it a question and answer session 
with posts.
